text: @matthewamiller @WhiteHouse Besides it's been close to 2 mons since LAST COVID19 Task Force Briefing AND the Task Force has other more qualified officials (ie Dr. Fauci, etc), WHAT is Barr working on COVID19 that's so URGENT he can't testify? LAME EXCUSE! #MakeBarrTestify
